title: Discovery Learning and SSI-Integrated Instructional Design for Enhancing Ecological Literacy

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Includes mathematical modeling and data interpretation processes through analysis of local ecosystem cases

learning_goals: Students can analyze local ecological issues using mathematical tools and extract at least three ecological impact factors
Students can evaluate ecological literacy assessment tools (e.g., 9-item checklist) with 80% accuracy using the SSI (Socio-Scientific Issues) approach
Learners can write a proposal for sustainable solutions based on ecological data derived from the discovery learning model
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
